entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Port Carling
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:12 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow at times heavy beginning this evening. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind east 30 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind becoming east 30 km/h in the morning then light in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
